channel.title: CVE Feed for MSI -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MSI -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1443|2024-03-07T02:48:24.955Z -- MSI -- MSI Afterburner
item.description: MSI Afterburner v4.6.5.16370 is vulnerable to a Denial of Service vulnerability by triggering the 0x80002000 IOCTL code of the RTCore64.sys driver. The handle to the driver can only be obtained from a high integrity process.

item.title: CVE-2024-1460|2024-03-07T02:52:48.773Z -- MSI -- MSI Afterburner
item.description: MSI Afterburner v4.6.5.16370 is vulnerable to a Kernel Memory Leak vulnerability by triggering the 0x80002040 IOCTL code of the RTCore64.sys driver. The handle to the driver can only be obtained from a high integrity process.

item.title: CVE-2024-3745|2024-05-18T12:34:46.896Z -- MSI -- MSI Afterburner
item.description: MSI Afterburner v4.6.6.16381 Beta 3 is vulnerable to an ACL Bypass vulnerability in the RTCore64.sys driver, which leads to triggering vulnerabilities like CVE-2024-1443 and CVE-2024-1460 from a low privileged user.
